content: Hi, can anyone lead me to the latest specs Care Team and Notes section (including coded Care Team Members Organizer and coded Note Activity sections) please? Thanks.
Ozlem, Go to the HL7 September 2019 Ballot site and download the CDA R2.1 Companion Guide R2. These template definitions are in the Appendices of that IG. Try Appendix A.

Hi Lisa, we logged into HL7 Ballot site but couldn't find the Companion Guide R2. Please see the screenshow attached. Can you please send us the link that we can access after log in? hl7_ballot_sc.png
